description: commit 4389f2292a0177c8eedc0a398ceb3c5535a9ef82 appears to have broken rescue on xenapi.  The xenapi driver requires the actual image id to be in the "image_meta" parameter to the rescue driver.
title: xenapi: Rescue regression

commit 15ef6089e5dbc54f8d6cdbfa9281ff523d60548a
Author: Brian Elliott <email address hidden>
Date:   Mon Sep 16 09:48:18 2013 +0000

    xenapi: Fix rescue
    
    commit 4389f2292a0177c8eedc0a398ceb3c5535a9ef82 appears to have broken
    rescue on xenapi. The xenapi driver requires the actual image id to be
    in the "image_meta" parameter to the rescue driver.
    
    bug 1227350
    
    Change-Id: Ifce27ab26eb5f998850faeefe5f21a4705439821
